name: Quick Coffee Cake
author: Stephanie
summary: This coffee cake is wonderful, the cake itself it moist and delicious while the topping is slightly crunchy and sweeter. Together, they make a delightful combination that you will surely enjoy!
directions: Preheat oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C)
Grease and flour a 9 inch square pan
In a large bowl mix together the flour, baking powder, sugar and salt
Cut in the shortening with a pastry blender to the size of small peas
In a separate small bowl, beat the egg well, then stir in the milk and vanilla
Add the egg-milk mixture to the flour mixture all at once
Pour batter into prepared pan and spread evenly
In a small bowl mix together brown sugar, 2 tablespoons flour and 1/2 teaspoon cinnamon
Bake in the preheated oven for 15 to 20 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the cake comes out clean
